dataPut

void dataPut(PVStructure requested,
             PVField pvField)
A put to a subfield has occurred.

Parameters:
requested - The requester is listening to this pvStructure.
pvField - The data that has been modified.

beginGroupPut

void beginGroupPut(PVRecord pvRecord)
Begin a set of puts to a record. Between begin and end of record processing, dataPut may be called 0 or more times.

Parameters:
pvRecord - - The record.

endGroupPut

void endGroupPut(PVRecord pvRecord)
End of a set of puts to a record.

Parameters:
pvRecord - - The record.

unlisten

void unlisten(PVRecord pvRecord)
Connection to record is being terminated.

Parameters:
pvRecord - - The record from which the listener is being removed.
